actions.committee: Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to prohibit the Federal Home Loan Bank Board from permitting Federal savings and loan associations to offer variable interest rate mortgages unless authorized by law.

summary.text: Prohibits the Federal Home Loan Bank Board from permitting Federal savings and loan associations to offer variable interest rates mortgages (secured by one to four family homes or dwelling units) unless authorized by law.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the Federal Home Loan Bank Board from permitting Federal savings and loan associations to offer variable interest rate mortgages unless authorized by law.
